projects.title: Whiteboard
projects.description: Built from scratch, this digital whiteboard is a personal project developed during leisure time. Leveraging the power of Angular and fabric.js, the web application provides a comprehensive set of features, including drawing, erasing, a laser tool, text input, various shapes, zoom functionality, image support, and multi-page capabilities.

projects.title: Talkie
projects.description: Talkie is my final year project, a hybrid Android chat app with advanced features. It includes spam detection, language translation, and a range of chat functionalities such as text messaging, file uploads, polls, and group chats.
